article: Hans Christian Andersen Hans Christian Andersen is a great writer . He wrote many popular stories for children all over the world . April 2 is his birthday and it is also Children ' s Book Day . Andersen was born in 1805 . When he was a little boy , his father read him a story every day . He felt very happy at that time . But his father died when he was 11 years old . Then he had to leave school . Andersen started working as an actor and singer . He loved reading books so much that he went back to school at 17 . His first book _ in 1835 . From then on , he wrote about one book a year for 37 years . There will be a park about Andersen ' s sales and life in Shanghai . If you like Andersen , you can go there to learn about his life and tales , and you can play games too . , .
questions: Which of the following is NOT true ?

model: when his father died , he was 12 years old .
andersen went back to school because he lost his job .
frank wrote plays stories for children .
children ' s book day is a good day to play with the children .
human: Andersen was happy to be with his father .
Andersen wrote books for about 37 years .
Children can play games in the park in Shanghai .
Andersen went back to school because he lost his job .
